prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a shell and a playful nature.
I want a Pokemon that has a unique shell shape and aquatic features.
Generate a small, pink Pokemon that loves to hide in its shell.
Make a cute creature that can live in both fresh and saltwater environments.
Imagine a bivalve Pokemon with distinctive spikes and a shiny surface.
Design a Pokemon that has a round body and a curious personality.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in underwater caves and coral reefs.

distinctive_features: Two prominent spikes on the shell
